entries.title: Spotify price hike looks more likely than ever after CEO comments around layoffs
entries.description: Spotify is the latest tech firm to announce mass job cuts, and the company’s pain could result in higher streaming costs

entries.title: FanDuel says user data possibly stolen in recent MailChimp breach
entries.description: FanDuel warns users to watch out for phishing attacks after names and email addresses were accessed.

entries.title: WhatsApp upcoming feature won't force you to sacrifice image quality
entries.description: WhatsApp devs currently working on a way to send photos in their original quality plus shortcuts for massive group chats.

entries.title: These security flaws could let hackers install anything they wanted in the Samsung Galaxy App Store
entries.description: Two flaws in the Galaxy App Store allowed hackers access to sensitive information.

entries.title: AWS is spending $35 billion on one of its most troubled US cloud regions
entries.description: Virginia is one of the most scrutinized AWS data regions following several recent major outages.

entries.title: Oculus Quest 2 owners can watch over 50 live NBA games for free
entries.description: Meta and the NBA are teaming up to give VR users the ability to watch over 50 of this season's games live for free

entries.title: New GTA Online exploit takes cheating to a whole new level
entries.description: A newly discovered security vulnerability in GTA Online’s code allows modders to mess with other players in a big way.

entries.title: Mega Microsoft layoffs may have killed off HoloLens for good
entries.description: A 5% reduction in headcount and the subsequent closure of a number of departments leave many speculating.

entries.title: Someone made a music record so tiny, it fits inside the groove of a normal vinyl record
entries.description: Miniature disc measures just 15 x 15 micrometres, but can’t be played on a regular turntable

entries.title: AMD is winning a key battle against Nvidia in GPU price war
entries.description: AMD’s RX 6000 graphics cards are seeing some big price drops – but that isn’t the case for the Nvidia equivalents.

entries.title: Marvel's Spider-Man 2 will be 'massive', voice actor teases
entries.description: In a recent interview, Peter Parker’s voice actor revealed the ambitious scale of Insomniac’s Marvel's Spider-Man 2.

entries.title: Security experts take down spam network hitting millions of iOS devices
entries.description: Researchers stumble across large malvertising campaign affecting a huge number of iOS devices.

entries.title: The Dead Space remake will feature a mysterious alternative ending
entries.description: The Dead Space remake trophy list has been published, revealing that the game will feature an alternative ending.

entries.title: Riot Games delays game patches following security breach
entries.description: Social engineering attack resulted in patch delays, but sensitive data is safe, Riot Games confirms.

entries.title: Marvel's Avengers is shutting down – so grab these freebies while you can
entries.description: The end to Marvel’s Avengers may be sad, but there’s a silver lining to this rain cloud.

entries.title: You can now set personal pronouns on Google Workspace
entries.description: Admins now have the option to enable pronoun display for users across organizations, and set who can see them.

entries.title: Motorola Razr 2023: what we want to see and what we know so far
entries.description: The Motorola Razr 2023 could be the best clamshell foldable of 2023 – here's what to expect and what we want from it.

entries.title: Microsoft really wants to find out if your version of Office is unsupported, but won't really say why
entries.description: Microsoft wants to know which version of Office you’re running, but we’re not quite sure why.

entries.title: The next TicWatch Pro smartwatch borrows its design from the Google Pixel Watch
entries.description: Mobvoi's upcoming TicWatch Pro 5 smartwatch boasts a powerful new Snapdragon chip and a simplified design.

entries.title: ChatGPT's paid version is close – and it could have a big impact on free users
entries.description: Rumors suggest that ChatGPT's paid version could cost $42 per month – and may also restrict access to the free version.

entries.title: 343 Industries commits to developing ‘future’ Halo games despite layoffs
entries.description: In the wake of Microsoft’s major layoffs, Halo Infinite studio 343 Industries has committed to developing more Halo games in the future.

entries.title: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 2's challenging Hardcore mode arrives with Season 2
entries.description: Thanks to this new season update, things are about to get bloody in Call of Duty Modern Warfare 2.

entries.title: Why Apple is right to forget about a HomePod mini 2 – for now
entries.description: New reports suggest Apple isn't working on a successor to its HomePod mini.

entries.title: Steam Deck testing shows it stumbles with demanding PC games – but that doesn’t matter
entries.description: Valve’s portable gaming PC has been tested with a raft of taxing games such as Gotham Knights.

entries.title: Fed up with noisy laptop fans? Fanless cooling tech could soon bring you peace
entries.description: New ultrathin 'cooling chips' could replace laptop fans for a quieter user experience.

entries.title: "The hair dryer sector lacks beauty": Celeb stylist Michael Douglas on why he launched the mdlondon BLOW
entries.description: Fed up with heavy, bulky, and ugly hair dryers, stylist Michael Douglas explains how he designed his "dream dryer" .

entries.title: Entire US "no fly list" leaked online after being left on an unsecured server
entries.description: The entire  US "No Fly List" 2019 database reportedly leaked alongside other CommuteAir information.

entries.title: Dangerous new 'Hook' Android malware lets hackers remotely control your phone
entries.description: Hackers could also snoop on your location, steal your files, and even make wire transfers from your bank apps.

entries.title: Samsung Galaxy S23 Ultra camera samples highlight impressive night and zoom shots
entries.description: Leaked Samsung Galaxy S23 Ultra camera samples show bright night shots and up to 30x zoom.

entries.title: Microsoft OneNote attachments are being used to spread malware
entries.description: Double-clicking malicious Microsoft OneNote file downloads dangerous trojans capable of stealing sensitive information.

entries.title: PS6: when can we expect the PlayStation 6 and what do we want to see?
entries.description: The PS6 may be a while off, but we've gathered everything we want to see from the console - and when we expect to see it.
